name: MMTabBarView
tagline: A Mac OS X tab control that works on 10.6-10.8 with Xcode 4. Pull requests welcomed.
body:
MMTabBarView (beta) ============ A Mac OS X tab control that works on 10.6-10.8 with Xcode 4. Pull requests welcomed. If you want to support this project, there are various ways in which you could do this:
  • Send me a pull request.
  • Review it on your site or blog.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
